md:
giải nghĩa từ "updating" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Updating (verb) - Cập nhật

* Meaning: to make something more modern or up-to-date by adding new information, features, or technology.
* Example sentence: The company is updating its software to make it more user-friendly.
* Related words: update, modernize, renovate, refresh
* Antonyms: outdated, obsolete, old-fashioned

Updating (noun) - Cập nhật

* Meaning: the act of making something more modern or up-to-date by adding new information, features, or technology.
* Example sentence: The updating of the website took several weeks to complete.
* Related words: update, modernization, renovation, refreshment
* Antonyms: stagnation, obsolescence, outdatedness

Note: The verb "updating" is often used in the context of technology, software, and digital media, while the noun "updating" can refer to any process of making something more modern or up-to-date.
